sqlMap.select: select att.id,att.name,att.code,att.gmt_work from(select att.id,att.name,att.code,att.gmt_work from attendance att where name = #name# and code = #code# and gmt_work = #gmtWork#) where between #page.start# and #page.start+20#
select att.id,att.name,att.code,att.gmt_work from attendance att where gmt_work = #gmtWork#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into attendance ( name, code, gmt_work, gmt_created, gmt_modeified ) values ( #name#, #code#, #gmtwork#, now, now )
select last_insert_id()
sqlMap.delete: delete from attendance where gmt_work between #fromdate# and #todate#
